com.dreamlink.communication.lib

类 ManagerConnect

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dreamlink.communication.lib.ManagerConnect

  • public class ManagerConnect
extends Object

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static interface  ManagerConnect.Connected
      notify the connect can use,and it disconnect.
      static interface  ManagerConnect.NotifyInterface
      the call back interface ,must be implement

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      List<User> getAllUser()
      get all of users in connect
      static ManagerConnect getInstance(Context context, ManagerConnect.Connected connected)
      get the instance of the ManagerConnect
      User getLocalUser()
      get local user info
      void register(ManagerConnect.NotifyInterface i, int appid)
      register call back listener with your application id. when you use IPC ,please register call back listener first
      void sendMessage(byte[] msg, int appID, User user)
      send message to the user
      void sendMessageToAll(byte[] msg, int appID)
      send message to all of users
      void unregister(ManagerConnect.NotifyInterface i)
      unregister call back listener. when you don't use the IPC ,please unregister call back

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 方法详细资料

      • getInstance

        public static ManagerConnect getInstance(Context context,
                         ManagerConnect.Connected connected)
        get the instance of the ManagerConnect
        参数:
        context - like getApplicationContext()
        返回:
        maybe null ,please check it

      • register

        public void register(ManagerConnect.NotifyInterface i,
            int appid)
        register call back listener with your application id. when you use IPC ,please register call back listener first
        参数:
        i - ManagerConnect.NotifyInterface,must implements
        appid - your application id

      • unregister

        public void unregister(ManagerConnect.NotifyInterface i)
        unregister call back listener. when you don't use the IPC ,please unregister call back
        参数:
        i - ManagerConnect.NotifyInterface

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(byte[] msg,
               int appID,
               User user)
        send message to the user
        参数:
        msg - the data will be send
        appID - your application id ,define in manifest meta-data
        user - the mesaage will send to

      • getAllUser

        public List<User> getAllUser()
        get all of users in connect

      • getLocalUser

        public User getLocalUser()
        get local user info
        返回:
        User the local user info, maybe null

      • sendMessageToAll

        public void sendMessageToAll(byte[] msg,
                    int appID)
        send message to all of users
        参数:
        msg - the data will be send
        appID - your application id ,define in manifest meta-data
